title: Oriented imagery viewer
accuracyInformation: Accuracy is calculated using the Orientation Accuracy property defined in the oriented imagery layer's service.
noImageError: No image available for the selected location.
onLoadMessage: Select a location on map to view imagery.
imageLoadError: Error occurred while loading the image.
noLocalPort: A value for local port is not provided. Local port is required to load local images.
noAttachment: No image or attachment available for the selected location.
currentFootprintTooltip: Toggle visibility of the displayed image's footprint.
additionalFootprintsTooltip: Toggle visibility of all additional footprints containing the location of interest.
additionalCameraLocationsTooltip: Toggle visibility of all additional camera locations of images containing the location of interest.
navigationTooltip: Explore returned images in relation to the location of interest.
imageEnhancementTooltip: Adjust image brightness, contrast, and sharpening.
imageGalleryTooltip: Explore thumbnails of all images depicting the location of interest.
mapImageConversionTooltip: Click on the image to see where that location is on the map, and vice versa.
unsupportedPanoramicImageryError: Viewer currently does not support visualizing {datasetFormat} 360-degree imagery.
invalidCameraHeadingWarningDescription: CameraHeading value is invalid for the selected image. All the oriented imagery viewer tools using CameraHeading value are disabled. Assign a valid value for the field in the attribute table to enable the tools.
preserveHeadingDescription: Preserve the camera heading when navigating to the next image.
preservePitchDescription: Preserve the camera pitch when navigating to the next image.
noActiveViewerFound: No active viewer found. Please load an image to enable the viewer.
selectImageForNavigation: Please select an image to navigate.
noLayerSelected: No layer selected. Please select an oriented imagery layer to enable the viewer.
navigationError: The following error occurred while navigating to the image: {error}.
imageNavigationDescription: Select an option to navigate between images either sequentially or in any direction of the current image view.
sequentialNavigationDescription: Navigate to the next image in the sequence.
directionalNavigationDescription: Navigate to the next image in the relative direction of the current image view.
featuresCapturedFromImage: Display all features captured from the current image.
noFeatureFoundWithObjectId: Cannot show the image associated as no feature found with the provided Object ID {objectId}.
